thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Disappointed indeed!
thread.title_full: Disappointed indeed! - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rejjyatun
title: Disappointed indeed!
text: Ideal location and one friendly bar server, unfortunately these are only the good things I can write about Crowne NY. The front staff did not exude warmth and were disorganized. Found a pistachio nut on the carpet floor and hair on the tub and toilet when we checked in. The room provided was small for a family of four. I requested an additional towel and it arrived 2 hours later after I called them again with a more serious tone. Bathroom faucets (hot and cold) didn't work well. Couldn't sleep due to noise. Will definitely not go back to this hotel.
